title: Sean Kelly: ‘I Wouldn’t Be Surprised if Pogačar Also Targets the Vuelta This Year’
content:
Former pro feels a successful Giro-Tour double could lead to an even bigger goal: ‘It’s never been done. And he’s the guy who could do it.’

Read the full article at Sean Kelly: ‘I Wouldn’t Be Surprised if Pogačar Also Targets the Vuelta This Year’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
